text: Lord Karitamen, as the Chosen of Phakth, embodies the might and favor of the God of Sky and Justice
Long-dead destriers, awakened to serve their Unliving masters far beyond death.
The pride of Nehekharan armies, impacting enemy lines with bone-shattering force and grinding the corpses beneath their heavy wheels.
Lord Karitamen's passion for knowledge and ancient lore has made him a well-versed scholar in the history and secrets of the Tomb Kings
Lord Karitamen carries the legacy of Amenemhetum the Great, the ancient ruler who once controlled vast territories.
Karitamen can project illusory images or apparitions to disorient and confuse the enemy
Lord Karitamen has been transformed into an unyielding warrior of unparalleled strength.
Lord Karitamen possesses a unique bond with Carrion units, enhancing their abilities and effectiveness in his army.
Karitamen can unleash a devastating spell inspired by Phakth's wrath. Endless summoning his servants
Lord Karitamen's burning resentment and desire for revenge against the Border Princes who now occupy the lands that were once his domain fuel this skill.
Karitamen’s signature weapon, anyone touched by their edges usually died an honourable death in battle
The Death Scarab’s head and torso were completely protected from the elements and at least partially preserved against the ravages of time.
Whispers of Phakth alone may rain down blistering rays of sunlight, striking down all those not worthy in his eyes.
